lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Because I can and want to!!!

lender.name: Hannele
lender.loan_because: I am a small entrepreneur and have myself got a loan for women who start with business in Finland - so keep the help in circulation!

lender.name: The Thickman Family
lender.loan_because: Part of The Thickman family went to Peru to explore the Amazon and hike the Inca Trail. After that trip the whole family decided to sponsor a school in Peru. Every year we all put in money for our school and all the extra money goes into our Kiva account. We try and find people who seem to fit our values of education and working to better the whole community.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family with scientists doing cutting edge research, engineers who work on environmental issues and advanced computer technologies, medical professionals who perform life saving and changing surgery and help to rehabilitate people, and educators who teach at a world renowned school. We all see science, technology, medicine, and most importantly education as the path forwards for people in both developed and developing countries.

lender.name: Torrie
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the entrepreneurial spirit. I want to be engaged and involved in positive social and economic change.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Fortune 500 Financial company. I help business leaders develop and implement business practices that uphold the values of "excellence" and "do the right thing."

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lender.name: Halley
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough that I can
lender.occupational_info: I study how the brain and spinal cord develop from a tube of cells in an embryo to the functional organs we posses as adults.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites to assist other business people, especially artists, in growing their ability to make a living doing what they love.

lender.name: Debi
lender.loan_because: I believe that women of the world are ones will be successful. i love supporting them in their independant ventures
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Emergency Room Nurse in a Children's Hospital

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: Nicholas Kristof said so.
lender.occupational_info: I help make television documentaries for Canadian audiences

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. Kiva gives people a hand up in becoming more self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I help hospitals operate efficiently, borrow money and invest money.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Victor
lender.occupation: Birder, Video Poker and Yo Yo Player
lender.loan_because: it is very rewarding.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: we all can help each other!
lender.occupational_info: I teach people about business and entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Oona
lender.occupation: Health Care Worker in Addiction and Mental Health

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I like to help people realize their hopes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help and encourage people to love and serve the Lord Jesus, and to love and serve one another.

lender.name: Syed
lender.loan_because: I love helping out my fellow humans.
lender.occupational_info: Compassion is the common thread which binds us ALL. Kiva is just one way of expressing it.

lender.name: Vjeko
lender.loan_because: Mahatma Gandhi once said "Be the change you want to see in the world." Well, I wish to help change people's lives for the better and Kiva seems to be a good platform for me to do this. By striving to change someone elses life for the better, I believe I am being a better person.
lender.occupational_info: I usually work with computers and websites.

lender.name: Mike and Mairi Lee
lender.loan_because: We are happy that we can help people in other countries that desperately need it. we can pick exactly what we want to support, the business and the people.
lender.occupational_info: Mike makes websites work, I work with an airline in our training department.

lender.name: TELUS Technology Leaders
lender.loan_because: Our team of Network Managers at TELUS are pleased to forego traditional gift-giving at the office to establish an ongoing legacy of helping the poor with a hand up to escape poverty and lead a healthy and happy family life
lender.occupational_info: I support and lead a fantastic team of compassionate and dedicated technology leaders who want to make a difference for the impoverished of our world

lender.name: Jarus
lender.loan_because: I would expect the same of myself if I were an entrepreneur.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I run the tests on a persons blood that doctors order . The Doctor reviews the test results to aid in his diagnosis of the patient. A example of some of the tests I run are Hepatitis and HIV

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: My Dad made the donation in my name.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver car parts on my bike and am a student in college in Santa Cruz, California

lender.name: albert
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a fair chance!
lender.occupational_info: I energize and inspire people to learn languages :)

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate prices of eye products with doctors in new England, and share ideas to help them grow their practice

lender.name: Nanette
lender.loan_because: I read the book Half the Sky and it inspired me to try to do a small part in changing the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish in a high school to English speaking students.

lender.name: Aleksandra
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Maribel
lender.loan_because: I may not have much, but I have enough to survive each day and I am blessed for that! I want to share with others...

lender.name: The Lavin Agency
lender.loan_because: Microloans for hardworking people is one of the best ideas ever.
lender.occupational_info: A speakers bureau, making the world a smarter place.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: Its only a small amount to each person, but the end product is a world of difference to those entrepreneurs.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world! KIVA is also fun and effective. I also enjoy the stories and seeing the impact I've made.
lender.occupational_info:
First period. Break. Second period. Lunch. Third period. Break. Fourth Period. Go home on the bus.
Repeat 5 times a week.

lender.name: Suffin Family
lender.loan_because: Instead of buying holiday gifts this year we made some micro loans. We let our kids pick the loan recipients at KIVA.org
lender.occupational_info: We are a Jewish family living in Southern California.

lender.name: Families United -Respite
lender.loan_because: Our philosophy is to treat all beings with dignity and respect. In keeping with our belief in the importance of Paying it Forward and knowing the joy it brings.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate in home services for families whose children or dependent adult have a developmental disability so that they can get a period of rest and relief.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I know that the money is going directly into the hands of the entrepreneurs. And when I am repaid I can put that money to work all over again.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I love that the lending system is based on trust. I like that I am in a position to help others. We are all the same. I would like to believe someone would help me if I needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency nurse. I help people who may be having a heart attack, spinal injury, drug overdose, or who may have even been in a car accident. Just depends what comes through the doors on the day.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nolan
lender.loan_because: it feels right

lender.name: Catherine
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to help purchase hospital equipment.

lender.name: Hiten Shah
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur by heart and can understand the needs these people face. I believe in micro-lending.
lender.occupational_info: I do not think I am doing something special, I feel it is our duty to help the society. And I like the approach Kiva has undertaken for helping people.

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupation: I am too young to work
lender.loan_because: I am too young to spend the money i am recieving, so it's better used this way and hopefully still there when i have need for it.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Helping makes me feel wonderful!
lender.occupational_info: My children don't go to school, I teach them at home. I also work on the internet to make money for my family. I'm happy to do something to help others make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Jim Jorgensen
lender.loan_because: believe in people of Kenya in agriculture

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in the use of capitalism to do good in the world

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Small things CAN make a big difference in peoples' lives.

lender.name: lauri
lender.loan_because: IT IS OUR CALLING AS CHRISTIANS TO HELP OTHERS AND SPREAD LOVE
lender.occupational_info: A CREATIVE, ARTISTIC AND PASSIONATE PROCESS OF DESIGN--THIS INCLUDES ARCHITECTURE, TEACHING, MIXED MEDIA, PAINTING ETC...

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others!

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: I find this an incredible oppurtunity for the borrower because it gives them a chance to further their business while not being a big burden on the lender.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: Hand-ups are more beneficial than hand-outs.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time for a charity that loans speech generating devices. I'm a full time parent and spouse and part-time farmer. We have chickens and a market garden. We have a lot of resources - family support, social services and second incomes that many on our planet don't.

lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: I've always been interested in micro loans.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of a mother to care for her family above all others if she has the resources that she needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make my family happy and healthy.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: as a new mom and a new entrepreneur, I want to support other mothers around the world as they strive to improve life for themselves, their family, and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a cloth diaper service based in Anchorage Alaska, offering weekly pick-up and delivery of quality cloth diapers, reusable wipes and other products that I confidently use with my own infant. We provide an eco-friendly alternative diapering method for local parents by giving Anchorage the cloth diaper choice.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: It matters.

lender.name: shae
lender.loan_because: I choose to help and inspire beautiful women of the world and their children to a bright and happy future!
lender.occupational_info: my paintings are straight from my heart and aim to bring hope and inspire the imaginations of everyone's inner child!

lender.name: David Morley
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: Look at a lot of Numbers and Data and make improvements to my organization to make it better.

lender.name: Planeta Feliz
lender.occupational_info: Founded by young professionals and social entrepreneurs, Planeta Feliz is dedicated to helping create a happier and sustainable world through education, medical care, small business development, structural work and humanitarian assistance one family, one community at a time.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: of karma.
lender.occupational_info: I guide passengers on a river raft (boat) on the Colorado River through Grand Canyon National Park, USA

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: Everything is interconnected. Karmic Repercussions. Om Tat Sat

lender.name: Lisa Jo
lender.loan_because: I would rather give money to justice ministries than sustained charity.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: The West has a rather shameful history with respect to the rest of the world. This is a small act of atonement . . .
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students, primarily women, about their history and about the lives of women in various cultures.

lender.name: Dianna
lender.loan_because: I don't need my cup to runneth over; it would only stain the linens.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I like to help people get on their feet and become self-sufficient

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I am a consequentialist.
lender.occupational_info: I teach philosophy and ethics to students of varying ages and professions.

lender.name: stolzcom
lender.loan_because: We believe that companies should be more "human" again and share their success with others to realize a better future for all.
lender.occupational_info: Distributor of mobile phones

lender.name: Karren
lender.loan_because: What a great way to share! to help someone realise their dream
lender.occupational_info: Share-trader

lender.name: Roseanne
lender.loan_because: I deeply believe in grass roots development and community involvement in economic projects.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: My dreams are held up by others, so yours are held up by my hand.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: my "loaves and fishes" can help others.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others to achieve their goals and "be all that they can be".

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky
lender.occupational_info: Housing Market and Business Analyst. Optimization specialist. Critical thinker. Problem Solver.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to grow up in a country with plenty of food and fresh clean water. This was simply because I was lucky enough to be born in the U.S., I had no say in it. None of the people that Kiva loans to asked to be in their situation either, they were simply born into that life. Yet they have the determination to make opportunities for themselves and their families. The least I can do is to help make that possible financially. No bank will loan to these people, so it is up to those who were dealt a little better hand in life to come to their aid.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: As a Christian I am supposed to have a heart for the poor. To give this way helps in so many ways.

lender.name: Kim and Mark
lender.occupation: Public Relations and Stay at home mom

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Our Mom Spot cares about moms!
lender.occupational_info: Our Mom Spot is an online social and support network for moms. We welcome moms of all ages & life circumstances. Be a part of our community, make new friends, and have fun!

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of creativity to change lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with communities to develop exhibitions on the history, art and culture of Asian Pacific Americans

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people even if it's only in a small way.

lender.name: Ashwini
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have everything I need to live comfortably, and so much more, and would like share some of what I have in order to give others the opportunity to build a more comfortable life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: NIchole
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Justine
lender.loan_because: I like to help people disadvantaged in life through their geographic position or through what life has thrown at them, who don't just accept this but have the willingness and drive to improve themselves and their family situation through hard work and initative.
lender.occupational_info: Hard and challenging but rewarding.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance works. I have seen first-hand the positive changes it can make in borrowers' lives while I was volunteering at an MFI in Peru (FINCA Peru). I believe that by giving people responsibility and education, rather than just aid, you empower them to improve their own quality of live. Most importantly, I loan because I feel that by supporting women through microfinance, I am helping promote positive social changes for gender-equality.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: "The miracle is this -- the more we share, the more we have."

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give others an opportunity to achieve things I already have.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently going to college.

lender.name: Shawna
lender.loan_because: I suport any opportunity for a woman to help themselves and their famiy to a better life.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.occupational_info: Retail

lender.name: Kim & Pam Preston
lender.loan_because: Some have so much and some have so little.
lender.occupational_info: Problem Solver

lender.name: Greg Ahlquist
lender.loan_because: I am committed to helping others. I have been blessed with much and consider it a privilege to partner with others to relieve poverty across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher in New York.

lender.name: River North Vending Inc
lender.loan_because: We want to help empower fellow entrepreneur's
lender.occupational_info:
River North Vending is a full service vending company based in Chicago Illinois that is focused on providing business owners and property managers with high quality vending machine solutions for their office, warehouse, or multi-unit residential dwelling. We offer a wide variety of snacks, food, beverages and health alternatives, coffee services, and red boxes.
One Common Goal
River North Vending has built a solid team of professional operations managers, technicians, route drivers, client relations representatives and marketers that share one common goal: Superior Customer Service. Combined with innovative technology and more product variety, River North clearly separates itself from other companies in the marketplace.
Because we are an owner-operated company, we have the flexibility to make quick decisions that result in better service to our customers. If problems should arise, one phone call is all it takes the owner will provide you with an efficient and helpful response to your concerns.
For more information on the how River North Vending can meet all your vending needs please click on our website link.

lender.name: Christopher & Audrey
lender.loan_because: We are our best when we are helping others.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: it is the easiest way for me to improve the lot of communities around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students who need some extra help to do well in school.

lender.name: Sahrie
lender.loan_because: I have been the recipient of someone's generosity to start my own business while taking care of my children and I would love to pass the same gift to others.
lender.occupational_info: I own a travel agency and I am raising three children.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus and Jesus taught to love others, so I take what I have and give to others as a way for them to better themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenage boys and girls about the bible and about Jesus Christ. I spend time with them, listen to them and love them in a world that does not love or listen because it is too busy.

lender.name: Ross Family
lender.loan_because: We are one

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: Take from the rich and give to the poor.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world." (Phillip Wenning, Laura Spencer and Mahatma Gandhi)

lender.name: forrest
lender.loan_because: i am lucky. :)
lender.occupational_info: trying to make better communities

lender.name: Kevan
lender.loan_because: I am able to help those people less fortunate than myself who are working to better themselves, their families lives, and the community around them.
